segments.text: It's time for desserts ! Are you still hungry ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've always got room for something sweet !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what are you going to try first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've never tried traditional Greek yogurt , so I want to try that first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do they serve the yogurt with anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I believe they add locally produced honey to it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that sounds good . I'm going to start with an Italian tiramisu .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: do you want to try some of my yogurt . It's a favorite everyday dessert in Greece .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ok . Mmm .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what do you think ? How does it taste ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's nice , but it's rather plain . Do you want to try my tiramisu ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure . I'll just have a bite .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what do you think ? Does it taste good ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it's absolutely delicious ! That is the best tiramisu I've ever had !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm glad you like it . I don't care for it . Why don't you finish my tiramisu so that I can try one of those fried bananas ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ok . I've had one of those before . They're really sweet and crunchy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you know where they are from .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I believe they are a local delicacy in the South .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you want me to get you one , too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yeah , why not ? We've already pigged out as it is !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ok , I'll be back with two fried bananas in a few minutes . Wait for me here !
segments.speaker: S1
